name: Content Creator Simulator
description: Step into the life of a true content creator! It's your job to produce the best content for your audience! Are you ready?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4400 @ 2.0 GHz Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800GT Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4400 @ 2.0 GHz Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800GT Storage: 300 MB available space
